title: Dropout mode
body_html:
I'm trying to import some models from theano to pytorch, but I'm facing issues with the dropout, which has a different mode: instead of doing nothing in eval and dropping + scaling in training, in theano I had scaling in eval and dropping in training.

Torch had this option to create the dropout module in one mode or the other. Could we also have this in pytorch?
